titles.title: Families Educational Opportunity Act of 1997
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for a deduction for qualified higher education expenses.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 6/3/1997--Introduced. Families Educational Opportunity Act of 1997 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an individual a deduction for the amount of qualified higher education expenses paid by the individual. Limits the amount allowed to $10,000. Provides for a limitation based on modified adjusted gross income.
